item.title: Queue::failing Mail Notification
item.description: Add to boot() in AppServiceProvider.php Queue::failing(function (JobFailed $event) { // $event->connectionName // $event->job // $event->exception $data['jobName'] = $event->job->getName(); $data['jsonEncodedData'] = json_encode($event->job->payload()); $data['exception'] = $event->exception; // Add current timestring $data['timeString'] = Carbon::now()->toDayDateTimeString(); Mail::send(['text' => 'emails.alert.queueFailing'], $data, function ($msg) { $msg->to(config('mail.support')) ->from(config('mail.from')) ->subject('Queue Error Detected'); }); });

item.title: Laravel mailing from terminal
item.description: Run: php artisan tinker and then: Mail::send('emails.test', [], function($message) { $message->to('youremail@domain.com')->subject('Testing email'); }); Change emails.test to point to a blade that works and populate the email you want to test. Source: https://www.gregoryvarghese.com/tag/email/
